[[TOC]]
= Distribution RESTful API = #top
''No description.'' [[BR]]
[[BR]]

----

== Look up distribution by id. ==
''Get a distribution object'' [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''method''': GET [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''path''': /distributions/<id>/ [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''permission''': READ [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''success response''': 200 OK [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''failure response''': 404 Not Found if the id does not match a distribution [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''return''': a Distribution object [[BR]]
[[BR]]

----

== List all available distributions. ==
''Get a list of all distributions managed by Pulp.'' [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''method''': GET [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''path''': /distributions/ [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''permission''': READ [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''success response''': 200 OK [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''failure response''': None [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''return''': list of distribution objects, possibly empty [[BR]]
[[BR]]
